attributes.action: capping on tour operators charging extra in school holidays
attributes.additional_details:
With schools imposing penalties and stricter rules on holidays in the school term - ENFORCE ACTION : THAT CAPS THE PERCENTAGE INCREASE ON HOLIDAY PRICES DURING SCHOOL HOLIDAYS AND PEAK SEASONS...
Family time is so much more essential in the current working world, but so many people cannot afford holidays in school holidays.as the tour operators dramatically increase the cost having a break.

A break at home is not the same as getting away from it all where there isn't any house work or DIY to get done, instead focus is on FAMILY!. Its time to stop the holiday companies cashing in on school holidays and let parents have some guilt free family time!

Every parents wants there children to do well, help children achieve better at school by families being able to afford to take there kids away and experience the best things in life After all, what is more important : 1 week off and a
smile on your son/daughters face or a fine!
HAPPY CHILDREN = SUCCESSFUL CHILDREN
